docs.snippet: The latest on developments in financial markets (all times local):

headline.print_headline: Markets Right Now: Trade Worries Send Stock Market Plunging
headline.main: Markets Right Now: Trade Worries Send Stock Market Plunging

docs.snippet: In this cozy weeknight supper, roasted cauliflower meets pasta, blue cheese and plenty of golden leeks.

headline.print_headline: One Last Creamy, Late-Winter Blast of Taste
headline.main: Mac and Cheese Eats Its Vegetables

docs.snippet: European shares slid on Wednesday as worries over a possible trade war dented sentiment and investors awaited the conclusion of a U.S. Federal Reserve meeting for signals on the pace of expected interest rate rises.

headline.print_headline: Trade War Worries Weigh on European Shares Ahead of Fed
headline.main: Trade War Worries Weigh on European Shares Ahead of Fed

docs.snippet: U.S. stock indexes struggled to find direction Wednesday, ending the choppy day of trading with a loss for the second straight day.

headline.print_headline: US Stock Indexes End Choppy Day of Trading Slightly Lower
headline.main: US Stock Indexes End Choppy Day of Trading Slightly Lower

docs.snippet: Certain batches of the company’s Gem 65 8-in-1 Multicooker may have an overheating problem, but the wildly popular pressure cooker is not affected.

headline.print_headline: Stop Worrying! Your Instant Pot Is Safe
headline.main: Stop Worrying! Your Instant Pot Is Safe

docs.snippet: AT&T Inc sought to persuade a judge on Monday to throw out evidence the government seeks to use in a trial that begins this week to show that the company's $85 billion acquisition of Time Warner Inc would harm consumers and competitors.

headline.print_headline: Judge Weighs What Evidence U.S. Can Use to Block AT&T, Time Warner Merger
headline.main: Judge Weighs What Evidence U.S. Can Use to Block AT&T, Time Warner Merger

docs.snippet: Detectives believe an aspiring model and actress from Macedonia who had been missing for more than a month was killed and dumped in a shallow grave in Northern California, police said Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: Police: Dead Boyfriend Suspected in Model's Killing
headline.main: Police: Dead Boyfriend Suspected in Model's Killing

docs.snippet: The government and AT&T exchanged opening salvos in a federal trial Thursday as the U.S. seeks to block the telephone giant from absorbing Time Warner, in a case that could shape how consumers get — and how much they pay for — stre...

headline.print_headline: US, AT&T Fire Opening Salvos as Govt Seeks to Block Merger
headline.main: US, AT&T Fire Opening Salvos as Govt Seeks to Block Merger

docs.snippet: The March for Our Lives demonstrations were triumphs of organic, youthful grass-roots energy, and of sophisticated, experienced organizational muscle.

headline.print_headline: Behind Gun Control Marches, Youthful Energy and Adults With Clout
headline.main: In Gun Control Marches, Students Led but Adults Provided Key Resources

docs.snippet: British consultancy firm Cambridge Analytica lies at the centre of a storm for using data obtained from millions of Facebook users without their permission after it was hired by Donald Trump for his 2016 U.S. presidential election campaign.

headline.print_headline: Explainer-What Are the Links Between Cambridge Analytica and a Brexit Campaign Group?
headline.main: Explainer-What Are the Links Between Cambridge Analytica and a Brexit Campaign Group?
